short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save Images in your desired format

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save Image As... is a convenient Chrome extension that allows you to save images in your preferred format directly from the context menu. With this tool, you can:

- Convert Images on the Fly: Right-click on any image and choose to save it as JPG, 
  PNG, or WEBP, regardless of its original format.
- Seamless Integration: The extension integrates smoothly into your browser, adding a 
  simple submenu to your right-click context menu under "Save Image As...".
- No External Tools Needed: Convert and download images without the need for 
  additional software or online converters.
- Efficient and Fast: Image conversion and downloading happen quickly in the 
  background, providing a hassle-free experience.
- User-Friendly Interface: Simply select the desired format from the submenu, and the 
  extension takes care of the rest.

Features:
- Supports popular image formats: JPG, PNG, and WEBP.
- Handles cross-origin images where possible, respecting web security policies.
- Minimal permissions required, ensuring your browsing privacy.
- Lightweight and easy to use, with no impact on browser performance.

Usage:
- Install the Save Image As... extension from the Chrome Web Store.
- Navigate to any webpage with images.
- Right-click on the image you wish to save.
- Hover over "Save Image As..." in the context menu.
- Select your desired format (JPG, PNG, or WEBP) from the submenu.
- The image will be converted and downloaded to your default downloads folder.

Note: Some images may have cross-origin restrictions that prevent them from being converted. In such cases, the extension will notify you of the issue.

Permissions Explanation:
- Context Menus: To add options to the right-click menu.
- Downloads: To save the converted images to your computer.
- Active Tab & Scripting: To execute the conversion script on the webpage you are 
  viewing.
- Host Permissions: Required to access images from various websites for conversion.
